sentences.sContent: They asked my father to intercede with the king on their behalf.
sentences.sCn: 他们请我父亲代他们向国王求情。

sentences.sContent: It has also asked Britain and the United States to intercede.
sentences.sCn: 它也请了英国和美国出面调停。

remMethod.val: inter (在…之间) + cede (让步) → 在双方之间都让步 → 调解

trans.tranOther: If you intercede with someone, you try to persuade them to forgive someone or end their disagreement with them
